businessProfile.name: Newby‚Äôs Pizza
businessProfile.address: 406 S Pershing St, Energy, IL 62933, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 406 S Pershing St, Energy, IL 62933, USA

reviews.text:
Arrived shortly before noon on a Friday. The atmosphere is an open friendly pizza restaurant. One of those that you can hang out and enjoy your pizza. Service was excellent, even with it being during lunch hours. Employees were courteous and efficient.  The food was amazing and I enjoyed the new flavors that made the pizza taste so much better. The sauce and fresh ingredients are a part of what makes up the new flavors. They are very generous with their toppings which makes a well made pizza with ratio to crust, sauce and toppings. Had both thin crust and hand tossed pizzas cooked to perfection. I also ordered an Italian salad that was full of toppings and flavor. This isn't a huge amount of lettuce with a few toppings sprinkled on top, the toppings are a part of the salad and can be tasted in every bite.

Overall the best pizza experience in a very long time.

The food is wonderful,  the customer service is exceptional.  The atmosphere is that of a small town one on one offering the best meals for the entire family.  I highly recommend you stop in and check this place out you won't be sorry. The best Philly steak I have ever had.

I had a bad experience here that easily could have been avoided. My buddies and I came in around 6:00 on a Saturday wanting to dine in. They have plenty of tables available for dining in but no wait staff, so we ordered at the counter. We got a Chicago-style deep dish, cheese sticks, and boneless wings. Then we got our drinks and sat at the table. I knew Chicago-style usually takes awhile, so we were waiting patiently. There was one other group dining in and they arrived after us and hadn't received their food yet either, so we kept waiting. After 50 minutes, I went to the counter to tell them that we'd take the wings and cheese sticks first if they were ready to go. Turns out, everything had been ready awhile and it was just sitting on the back shelf for who knows how long. Yes, we were sitting there for 50 minutes and the entire staff who could see us through the ordering window never once thought to bring us our food. Totally unacceptable.

Since it was all packaged to go (even though we had intended to eat there), we left and ate it at home. It tasted great, which was a big bummer that it was cold. The boneless wings would have been better if they were sauced instead of just being served as chicken nuggets with a side of dipping sauce.

Overall, this place has great potential if they can get their customer service corrected.

We love ordering from Newby‚Äôs. The food is always hot and delicious. The salads are huge and bagged separately so it is cold.  Pizza, subs and wings are all great. Sorry the picture had to come after we started eating. üòÜ

Great food, always delicious and served in a quick timeframe.
We love their Chicago pizza and calzones.

The restaurant atmosphere is basic, but we always order carry out.

The staff is always friendly and polite as well.

We will continue to come back for great food

We love their Chicago pizza and calzones.

The restaurant atmosphere is basic, but we always order carry out.

The staff is always friendly and polite as well.

recentReviews.author: Katrena Shadowens-Sims
recentReviews.text:
Arrived shortly before noon on a Friday. The atmosphere is an open friendly pizza restaurant. One of those that you can hang out and enjoy your pizza. Service was excellent, even with it being during lunch hours. Employees were courteous and efficient.  The food was amazing and I enjoyed the new flavors that made the pizza taste so much better. The sauce and fresh ingredients are a part of what makes up the new flavors. They are very generous with their toppings which makes a well made pizza with ratio to crust, sauce and toppings. Had both thin crust and hand tossed pizzas cooked to perfection. I also ordered an Italian salad that was full of toppings and flavor. This isn't a huge amount of lettuce with a few toppings sprinkled on top, the toppings are a part of the salad and can be tasted in every bite.

Overall the best pizza experience in a very long time.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 5 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers appreciate the generous toppings and fresh ingredients that enhance the pizza's flavor, creating a well-balanced pizza experience. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant is praised for its exceptional customer service, with staff being courteous and efficient even during busy lunch hours. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The food is consistently described as hot, delicious, and served quickly, making it ideal for quick service restaurant patrons. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Show customers you value their input

recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
